local_intent: Approach and align to the precomputed grasp pose for the grape, then verify arrival at that pose.
assumptions: Pose key grasp_grape is valid and up-to-date
coherence_with_global: Matches the GLOBAL_BT approach phase: checks pose availability, executes ApproachAndAlign with tolerance 0.01 and timeout 1500 ms, then verifies position with IsAt.
